content: web page contains a link to a matching bonnet **notes from designer ** gown is open all the way down the back - do not join please line the dress especially the skirt for different looks i have used other stitches on the skirt -- for a boy a simple double_crochet is good i have also extended the length of the skirt and have woven a ribbon through the last row to gather for the look of a sleeping gown **note from raveler ** when i made this pattern for a fall burial i wanted to soften the colors so i added a ruffle between the bodice and dress using the shell pattern of the dress
